gameDetails.name: Carcassonne: GQ Promo Tiles
gameDetails.description:
Twelve additional tiles for Carcassonne. Includes 2 river tiles (a spring with an attached road, and a river between two cities) and 10 other tiles not previously seen.  This includes a cloister with 4 roads, and a piece which contains only a field.  (The official ruling gives this tile no special abilities, but a popular variant treats the pig farm on this tile as 1 point bonus per city at endgame for the winning farmer in this field.)

Availability:

     Published in Games Quarterly magazine, Issue #11 (2006).


Part of the Carcassonne series.
